name: The Adventures of Moon-Man
description:
Krakens have taken over the Solar Sytem.

You as Moon-Man have to liberate every planet.

Can you do it?

Controls:

EVERY LEVEL IS DIFFERENT. SO YOU MIGHT WANNA CONSIDER PLAYING THE WHOLE THING.

Reverse gravity with E and move left/right with A/D.

Restart level with Spacebar anytime.

Good Luck!!

All music from orangefreesound.com
